contents: 1. fol. 14b-19a: Sharḥ qawl Ibn al-ʻArabī fī ḥaqq īmān Firʻawn.
3. fol. 42b-46b: Risālah mutaʻalliqah bi-bāb al-shahīd min sharḥ al-Wiqāyah li-Ṣadr al-Sharīʻah.
10. fol. 150a-b: Risālah fī sharḥ ḥadīth ʻʻkuntu kanz...ʼʼ.
11. fol. 151b-152b: Risālah fī sharḥ ḥadīth ʻʻAllāhumma ṣalli ʻalá Muḥammad wa-ʻalá āl Muḥammad kamā ṣallayta ʻalá Ibrāhīm...ʼʼ.
12. fol. 153a-b: Risālah fī tawjīh al-tashbīh fī ʻʻAllāhumma ṣalli ʻala Muḥammad...ʼʼ.
14. fol. 162b-166a: Luʼluʼ al-naẓīm fī rawm al-taʻallum wa-al-taʻlīm.
18. fol. 209b-210b: Risālah fī taḥqīq afʻāl al-tafḍīl.
19. fol. 211b-212b: ʻUjālah min taḥrīr fī iʻrāb ʻʻal-ṭālib al-faqīrʼʼ.
20. fol. 212b-213b: Risālah fī bayān iʻrāb ʻʻal-ṭālib al-faqīr Zaydʼʼ.
subject: Manuscripts, Turkish—New Jersey—Princeton
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
